basic_info.description: I served 5 years in the U.S. Navy. I obtained my B.S. in Digital Media/Web Design in 2019 and afterwards committed my efforts to becoming a web developer. I want to create websites/web apps to help others achieve their goals and help create a better future for the next generation.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: This project was made using vanilla HTML, CSS, and Javascript. The web page is designed to be a landing page with descriptions describing the store. There's also a link to a table which gives sales data (random data).

projects.title: Horned Beast Gallery
projects.description: This web app displays images of horned beasts. Each beast card has a like button that the user can click and add likes to. When the image is clicked it will create a modal pop-up of that image that is much larger for the user to view. Lastly, it has a sorting option based on number of horns that the beasts have.

projects.title: Bus Mall App
projects.description: This web app displays 3 images that are unique each round. The user clicks on one and the clicks and views are recorded. At the end of the rounds a graph is displayed of the amount of clicks each image had as well as its views.
